body_html: Actually you probably don't want to be using the same GPU simultaneously from two TensorFlow processes. It's somewhat safe to pause one while the other uses the GPU, but if they are both actively using the GPU, bad things are likely to happen, I believe.
body_text: Actually you probably don't want to be using the same GPU simultaneously from two TensorFlow processes.  It's somewhat safe to pause one while the other uses the GPU, but if they are both actively using the GPU, bad things are likely to happen, I believe.
body: Actually you probably don't want to be using the same GPU simultaneously from two TensorFlow processes.  It's somewhat safe to pause one while the other uses the GPU, but if they are both actively using the GPU, bad things are likely to happen, I believe.
